text.mod.description: Unofficial Rock-afire Explosion simulator for Minecraft, mod made by FlooferLand!
block.showbiz.speaker: Speaker
tooltip.showbiz.block.staged_bot:
Also known as animatronics/figures
- Right-click to change models
- Place a block on top to hide the block
tooltip.showbiz.block.reel_to_reel:
Plays back reels
Slot in a reel at the top
Start/pause playback by right-clicking on the sides
tooltip.showbiz.block.greybox:
Reads data from a reel-to-reel
and spits out show data
tooltip.showbiz.block.speaker:
Shakes the air violently to produce sound
(currently only mono audio supported)
tooltip.showbiz.block.show_parser:
Turns show bit data into redstone
when hooked up to a Greybox
tooltip.showbiz.block.show_selector:
Sends out a trigger signal
when one of the buttons is pressed
tooltip.showbiz.block.curtain_block:
Place at the top of a stage to droop curtains down.
Use a dye to change the colour
